name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: An ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable armrests, and breathable mesh back.

name: Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Over-ear wireless headphones with active noise canceling, Bluetooth connectivity, and up to 30 hours of battery life.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: A 750ml double-wall insulated water bottle that keeps beverages cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with a 6mm thickness, providing excellent cushioning for all yoga and Pilates exercises.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch controls and three brightness levels, perfect for study or office.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: 10,000mAh power bank with dual USB ports for quick charging, compatible with all devices.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact Bluetooth speaker with rich bass, waterproof design, and 10 hours of playtime.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with breathable mesh upper and cushioned sole for maximum comfort.

name: Smartwatch
description: Feature-packed smartwatch with heart rate monitor, GPS tracking, and customizable watch faces.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Fast wireless charger compatible with all Qi-enabled devices, featuring a sleek, compact design.
